title: Great Falls Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons            Operating Hours Great Falls Park is open during daylight hours year round.  Great Falls Park is open: 7:00 AM to thirty (30) minutes after sunset, daily, and closed December 25.       Park Hours  Great Falls Park is open seven days a week from 7 am until thirty (30) minutes after sunset. Closed December 25. Visitor Center Hours  Great Falls Park Visitor Center is open:  At daylight savings beginning (2nd Sunday in March) 10 AM to 5 PM At daylight savings end (1st Sunday in November) 10 AM to 4 PM  Snack Bar Hours  The snack bar is open Wednesday to Sunday from March to November. Hours are 10 AM to 4 PM.
